ADD_FEED_HELP_CHANGE_TORRENT_DL_LOCATION: Check box to change the location of where the torrent is downloaded. The default is the download directory set by rtorrent.
ADD_FEED_HELP_CHANGE_TORRENT_SAVE_LOCATI: Go to Settings > Download or modify your rtorrent config file to change the default path. Specifying a path here will only impact the current torrent.
ADD_FEED_ERROR_PATH_REQ_IF_CHANGE_TORREN: A path is required if you check Change torrent download location!
ADD_FEED_HELP_AUTODL: Check box to automatically download torrents when the feed is updated.
ADD_FEED_HELP_REGEX: Check box to add regex filters.
DELETE_FEED_WARNING: Deleting will remove the feed from the list.
